resources.string: You have collected more than 1000 nuggets, why not visit the shop?
Error, no upgrade found with ID:
Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to delete the game?
Language swapped, restart the app to apply changes
A simple wooden pickaxe that increases mining efficiency. (+6 nuggets per hit)
A more durable pickaxe, allows for easier mineral extraction. (+8 nuggets per hit)
A simple automated system that extracts minerals slowly without the need to click. (+5 nuggets per second)
(Repeatable) Increases your resistance and strength, allowing you to extract more minerals with each hit. (+6 nuggets per hit)
A more durable and efficient iron pickaxe. (+11 nuggets per hit)
Transports minerals more efficiently, increasing passive production. (+12 nuggets per second)
(Repeatable) Small upgrades to your tools increase mining efficiency. (+8 nuggets per hit)
An automatic excavator that extracts minerals effortlessly. (+15 nuggets per second)
(Repeatable) Controlled explosions allow for more minerals to be extracted in less time. (+10 nuggets per hit)
A monstrous machine that extracts tons of minerals per second. (+40 nuggets per second)
(Repeatable) A powerful laser that melts rocks instantly. (+15 nuggets per hit)
Separation of minerals at the atomic level for maximum efficiency. (+100 nuggets per second)
(Repeatable) Small robots that work at the atomic level, collecting minerals tirelessly. (+100 nuggets per second)
